message: I'm now convinced that Chrome Sucks! Specially garbage collection. when you remove an element from the DOM it doesn't clear the memory of this element at once/at all. try to make a simple page with 3 iFrames and see the memory usage. then destroy all the dom of the page and notice the same memory usage if not increasing for this tab!

data.message: at least they should provide an API to access your elements in teh garbage collection this way we can increase our apps performance :)
